info.instructions: Welcome to The Doors of Memory. The object of this game is to clear the board by matching all the letters.

To play, choose two tiles. Their contents will be displayed for two seconds before vanishing again. At this point, take as long as you need to to associate the letters to the scenes on the tiles. Once you are ready to move on, hit the continue button, the pieces will scramble and you will get another turn. The fewer turns you make and the less time you take, the higher your score!
